page.title: 09LIVING IN THE COUNTRY
page.content: All the houses in Inverugie are large,and we have the impression that wealthy people live there.Nearly everyone out there asked us in,gave us things to eat and explained to us that they had either come for quietness or for their husband's work.The people in Inverugie are extremely friendly.When questioned,no one said that they'd rather move back to the town or city because of the noise and traffic.Most of the houses are large and have elegant gardens because,of course,they love gardening.All the people,we interviewed thought that the town was more "scary" than the country and they had all made the right choice by moving there.Half of them had lived in a farm or house in the country for most of their life.
